Creating an Account¶

  1. Open the Moonbeam Application

Figure 1¶

  1. Select the Sign up for a Moonbeam Envision account to sign up for an account, which leads to the screen below

Figure 2¶

  1. Fill out your information here then you should receive an email from Rumii to confirm the new account

Moonbeam Envision
